dn10:1.12.3: Pisuṇaṁ vācaṁ → pisuṇāvācaṁ (pts1ed) | samaggarato → samaggarāmo (bj) | anuppadātā → anuppādātā (pts1ed)
dn10:1.19.2: nāḷikaṁ asiṁ → khaggaṁ (bj, pts1ed); asiṁ khaggaṁ (sya-all, km); khaggaṁ asiṁ (mr)
dn10:1.20.2: janapadakathaṁ itthikathaṁ → itthikathaṁ purisakathaṁ (bj, cck, sya1ed, pts1ed); itthīkathaṁ purisakathaṁ (sya2ed); itthikathaṁ purisakathaṁ kumārakathaṁ kumārikathaṁ (mr)
dn10:1.29.1: Sa kho so → ayaṁ kho so (mr)
dn10:2.37.6: Natthi cevettha → natthi cettha (bj); natthi no kiñci (sya-all, mr)
